lessonTitle: Lesson 04 - Uploading to GitHub and Deploying with Netlify.
lessonDescription: Use CSS Grid to make a layout, use Git and GitHub to make a Pull request and merge our code.

questions.question: To add Google Fonts to our project, we need to make a change to:
If we want our HTML code to be more meaningful, improve accessibility and SEO, we should use _______ HTML.
In the following CSS, how many rows will there be? `grid-template-rows: auto 1fr auto auto auto;`
How can you make sure there is no space around the outside of an html element? `__________: 0;`
Why do we make Pull Requests?
multipleChoiceAnswers: To give us another chance to review our code
To make it easy to see what we did in the future
To help make sure the 'master' branch is always deployable
